securitySection.title: Security Transparency

points.point1: Only your password is securely protected.
points.point2: Other account information (like name, email) is not guaranteed to be secure.
points.point3: Chat/Conversation Content: The secrecy of all conversation content is not guaranteed.
points.point4: Conversations may accidentally become accessible or visible to third parties.

securitySection.criticalWarning: Important Alert: Do not input personal or sensitive information into the chat features. Use the service at your own risk.

privacyAndSecuritySubTab.securityDisclaimerText: Only password data is securely protected. Other account information and all conversation content are not guaranteed to be secure. Conversations may become unintentionally visible or accessible. Use the service and its chat features at your own risk, and **do not enter personal or sensitive information**.
